Package Controller

Class CRUDTheatre

java.lang.Object
Controller.CRUDTheatre
public class CRUDTheatre extends Object
A class of CRUD operations on the Theatre.dat file Calls RWController to read and write data into .dat file
Since:
2022-10-25
Version:
1.0

    • readTheatreList

      public static void readTheatreList() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method calls the RWController, to read the file, and put them into listOfTheatres Hashmap. THIS READ FUNCTION HAS TO BE USED EVERYTIME THE PROGRAMME STARTS
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

      Parameters:
